name: pruefprot
short_description:
Wicket-based Java web application for managing exam records at a university. Originially created for the University of Jena during practical course of "Database Systems 2" lecture: http://www.informatik.uni-jena.de/dbis/lehre/ss2009/dbae/index.html 
Currently running for the department of Computer Science at University of Jena:
http://pruefprot.minet.uni-jena.de/Login
